title: With Majority in Sight, Republicans Hush Talk of Impeaching Biden
description: Party leaders have begun to equivocate about whether they would seek to impeach President Biden if they won a House majority, but pressure is building from those who have vowed to do so.
dc:creator: Annie Karni
media:credit: Tom Brenner for The New York Times
media:description: Representative Kevin McCarthy, the minority leader, has expressed a stance on impeaching President Biden that appears to be at odds with some of the members of his conference.
